description: As a Java Developer, I worked in the update of custom adapters. These adapters decoupled the integration of the application with 3rd party provided products like databases, reporting systems and BPM servers

responsabilities.content: Implemented new modules in a suite of regression tests to guarantee the adapters back-compatibility
Implemented unit tests using JUnit to increase code quality and coverage
Updated adapters for SQL databases like Oracle and MySQL, ECM servers like Oracle ECM, Business Intelligence servers like Pentaho and Oracle BI and BPM products like Oracle SOA
Worked with SVN for code versioning
